attributes.action: Death Penalty for Terrorists Caught in the act of a Terrorist Offence
attributes.additional_details:
If you have been incensed by the horrific murder of soldier Lee Rigby and disagree that British Taxpayers should have to pay to keep the perpetrators of this sickening crime in prision. Please sign this epetion.

Any perpetrators caught in the act of commiting a terrorist offence which either kills or is intended to kill British Citizens on British Soil, should be stripped of their human rights and their right to a trial under British Law. Once the security services have finished interrogation of the perpetrators for intelligence purposes. The perpetrators should be executed by firing squad.
